features: Manufactured by the #1 leading manufacturer of First Aid Kits in the USA. Be Smart Get Prepared kit includes 397 pieces of comprehensive, medical grade first aid treatment products. Includes BONUS Mini Backpack perfect for travel, car, or kids.
This Kit meets Standards as a Medical Device. Trusted by parents, students, nurses, hospitals, teachers, doctors, children's daycares.

HARD EVA CASE: The rugged, sturdy, high density polyethylene vinyl acetate case is impact resistant and flexible. Fully organized interior compartments provide quick access. Size case measures 8.5in x 7in x 3.5in, is portable and can easily fit anywhere.

"MULTIPURPOSE: Perfect for any occasion or events - family, home, kitchen, workplace, school, dorm room, college, kids, pools, church, camping, hiking, fishing, hunting, backpacking, sports, boating or mountain biking. Keep in bug out bag for emergency.
Fully organized interior compartments provides quick access. The case is rugged, sturdy, high density, and impact resistant.
body.description: Manufactured by the #1 leading manufacturer of First Aid Kits in the USA, this Deluxe 397 piece kit comes in a lightweight, durable, Cordura covered EVA molded foam case for convenient storage and easy access, plus it includes a ★BONUS★ bonus mini backpack for additional storage.Contains the following items: - CLEAN -• 30 Alcohol prep pads• 30 Antiseptic towelettes - TREAT -• 10 Antibiotic ointment packets• 2 Burn cream packets• 1 Instant Cold Compress 5 in x 6 in [12.70 cm x 15.24 cm] • 4 Non aspirin tablets• 6 Aspirin tablets - PROTECT -• 102 Assorted bandages [sizes vary] • 75 Sheer bandages - 3/8 in x 1-1/2in (0.95cm x 3.8cm) • 30 Sheer bandages - 3/8 in x 1-1/2in (0.95cm x 3.8cm)• 25 Waterproof sheer bandages - 1in x 3in (2.5cm x 7.6cm)• 14 Sterile Gauze Pads - 4 in x 4 in/4 ply [10.16 cm x 10.16 cm]• 10 Sheer Bandages 2 in x 4 in [5.08 cm x 10.16 cm]• 6 Butterfly Closures • 4 Sterile Gauze Pads 2 in x 2 in/4 ply [5.08 cm x 5.08 cm] • 3 Fabric Knuckle Bandages 1 1/2 in x 3 in [3.81 cm x 7.62 cm] • 1 Sterile Trauma Pad 5 in x 9 in [12.70 cm x 22.86 cm] - ESSENTIALS -• 10 Cotton Tip Applicators 2 3/4 in x 1/8 in [6.99 cm x 0.32 cm] • 10 Small Wood Splints• 10 Safety Pins• 4 Splinter Removers• 4 Wood Splints• 2 Examination Gloves 1 pair• 1 Waterproof Tape 1/2 in x 90 in (2 yd 1 1/2 ft) [1.27 cm x 2.29 m]• 1 Scissors 4 1/2 in [11.43 cm]• 1 Tweezers 3 in [7.62 cm]• 1 First Aid Guide - EMERGENCY ESSENTIALS -• 1 Emergency Whistle w/ lanyard• 1 Brightstick 12-hr

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Mission To be the most dependable and excitingly innovative manufacturer of First Aid Kits, Emergency Preparedness Kits in all categories of Home, Office, School, Auto, Sporting Goods, Outdoors, Marine and Farm for the purpose of spreading the good news, supporting Ministries and Missionaries of all nations, in their calling and election to care for orphans, help the poor, and feed the hungry, shelter the homeless, encourage, comfort and urge everyone to live lives worthy of God. Be Smart Get Prepared Total Resources International (TRI) is one of the leading manufacturers of First Aid Kits and Emergency Preparedness Essentials in the nation. For the past 25 years, we have worked hard to develop, manufacture and distribute premium products and services that provide smart, sensible solutions under the Be Smart Get Prepared brand. By embracing research, trends, practicality, functionality and innovative technology, our products address consumer needs, help secure personal and family safety.

Satisfaction We design with you in mind and are committed to providing excellent service and creating quality products that offer smart, sensible solutions. FDA Registration: # 2029439UL / cGMP Certficate: m15-159724OSHA Compliant: Part # 1915, Inspect Date: 2017ANSI / ISEA Compliant: Part # 1915, Inspect Date: 2017 Hard EVA Case The rugged, sturdy, high-density polyethylene vinyl acetate case is impact resistant and flexible. Fully organized interior compartments provide quick access. Size case measures 8.5in x 7in x 3.5in is portable and can easily fit anywhere. Bonus Mini Backpack Included is a bonus mini backpack, in order to provide a more personalized and portable option for travel, car, or kids. Organized Compartments This kit comes with organized interior compartments, providing quick and easy access during use, as well as easy refill if necessary.

Office Safety Since work is where most time is spent away from home, employees have every right to feel safe in their work environment. Our kits are stocked with comprehensive components that will meet and exceed your requirements. Stored in a durable case, our kits are organized and allow little to no room for error in treating common workplace mishaps. At Home Care Our kits are designed to treat common everyday mishaps that do not require professional medical attention. Packed in convenient cases, our kits are durable, organized, and easily comprehensible. It is important to us that every family is safe and sound in their own home, with first aid treatments readily on hand. Traveling Smart Whether taking a cross country road trip or backpacking through Europe, our First Aid Kits have all the essential components to keep you safe and in good health on your journey. Throw it in your purse, stash it in your carry-on bag, or sling it across your shoulders. Our kits are convenient and ready to go when you are. Sports & Outdoors Whether you are an athlete, coach, or a parent on the sidelines, we all know that being active is an open door for injuries to occur and muscles to be pulled. Cuts, scrapes, bruises and more; our comprehensive kits are designed to help all your outdoor and sport's needs, on and off the field.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this kit! Comes with everything you could possibly nee. smaller kit is perfect for hiking and con the go things like sports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kit for emergencies!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a minimalist that likes to have things on hand when needed. There’s been many times That I’ve experienced cuts or wounds and have nothing on me to cover it up. This kit is very portable and compact. The best part if they give you a bonus pack that can be strapped to a Molle pack. I recently got burned at work and this kit was perfect to help stop the bleeding until I was able to tape up the would at home. Is it a trauma kit no but it will get the job done when necessary. Would recommend others to buy for family emergencies or just personal car emergency kits for everyday life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Needed a First Aid Kit for My Truck
reviews.reviewText: This kit is SO well thought out. It has the items you need and plenty of them. The case is a hard shell and organizes the contests well. Band-aids galore, but also a chemical ice pack, medical scissors, slings you name it.I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than enough first aid
reviews.reviewText: Nice product - came in package of 2 for a home first aid and one for travel. Both are durable and easy to find in an emergency, and have everything you need for immediate first aid needs.Compared to others, I like that I don’t have to pack a travel size first aid or pay to have a secondary travel friendly kit, and kit is big enough to handle the minor scrapes, cuts, bruises and burns no problem. Well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, would buy again
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised, The first aid kit came with everything needed in the event of emergency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This kit is nice for your trail bags or in your side-by-side great to have with you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Everything but a mobile surgical unit :)
